pkgmetadata.longdescription: deflate=======This is a very thin Python wrapper Eric Biggers' excellent[libdeflate](https://github.com/ebiggers/libdeflate). Currently, it only handles compression and decompression ofgzip data, with a very basic API:```pythonimport deflatelevel = 6 # The default; may be 1-12 for libdeflate.compressed = deflate.gzip_compress(b"hello world!" * 1000, level)original = deflate.gzip_decompress(compressed)```
